full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Buprenorphine Supply

## Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4696007433
* **Title:** Buprenorphine Supply (Supply of Buprenorphine Extended-Release Injection Solution)
* **Reference Number:** WS4696007433-Doc4698251471
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Publication Date:** 2024-07-24
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-08-08T14:00:00

## Tender Status

The tender for the supply of buprenorphine extended-release injection solution has expired.

## Supply Requirements

Public Services and Procurement Canada intends to establish a national master standing offer with Indivior UK Ltd. (Canada) for the supply of buprenorphine extended-release injection solution for the treatment of opioid dependence. The requirement is to supply approximately 6,200 doses per year, with delivery taking place as and when required.

## Background and Context

This tender is part of a long-term supply arrangement to support the treatment of opioid dependence among inmates under the care of Correctional Service Canada (CSC).

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

## Contact Information

For further information or to request tender documents, please contact Suzanne Bissonnette, Public Services and Procurement Canada, at (819) 955-2770 or suzanne.bissonnette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
